ygData.subject: Re: Research Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: everytime you zone, just have an auction message ready saying you are buying pages. I ve gathered about 30 so far and made 13 or 14 tries with 7 or 8
ygData.messageBody:
everytime you zone, just have an auction message ready saying you are buying
pages. I've gathered about 30 so far and made 13 or 14 tries with 7 or 8
successes.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Ric R [mailto:redr@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 10:54 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Research Skill


From: Ric R <redr@...>

Research items (pages and sort) can be found at random off level 20+ mobs
Im told, but I've found them on lower level mob's as well. As for raising
the skill without using pages, other than using skill training points on
it, I dont know of any other way to get it up.
